price: Vječno će i zauvijek u njima boraviti. Uistinu, u Allaha je nagrada velika.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجۡرٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā abadan inna al-laha ʿindahu ajrun ʿaẓīmun
